text: 1. Ooooh exciting news! You can order a SIGNED copy of Easy Everyday right here! 2. I’m officially old because I think I “threw my back out” and the worst part is I don’t even know how. Like I maybe moved one millimeter in the wrong direction. What!! 3. I want this cozy cornbread casserole for dinner. 4. Iced coffee season no matter the temps! Always. 5. I am in the BIGGEST book hangover ever after finishing The Favorites and desperately need something to get me out of it. I think it requires something trashy so I can just move on. Hello, when book characters are your friends… 6. The title made me laugh: I’d rather be sick than eat these soup drops. 7. TV things!! I finished this season sex lives of college girls. I also started Wild Cards which I really love! I tried to watch On Call on prime… but I just don’t think it is for me. 8. I don’t think I’m ready to carry my dessert in a glass purse.
html:
1. Ooooh exciting news! You can order a SIGNED copy of Easy Everyday right here!

2. I’m officially old because I think I “threw my back out” and the worst part is I don’t even know how. Like I maybe moved one millimeter in the wrong direction. What!!

3. I want this cozy cornbread casserole for dinner.

4. Iced coffee season no matter the temps! Always.

5. I am in the BIGGEST book hangover ever after finishing The Favorites and desperately need something to get me out of it. I think it requires something trashy so I can just move on. Hello, when book characters are your friends…

6. The title made me laugh: I’d rather be sick than eat these soup drops.

7. TV things!! I finished this season sex lives of college girls. I also started Wild Cards which I really love! I tried to watch On Call on prime… but I just don’t think it is for me.

8. I don’t think I’m ready to carry my dessert in a glass purse.
